mapper.select: select dong_code, dong_name from code_dong where dong_name like concat('%', #{key_word}, '%')
select dong_code, dong_name from code_dong where left(dong_code, 5) = left( #{gugun_code}, 5 )

select sido_code, sido_name from code_sido order by sido_code
